reviewText:
If you're looking for a hentai DVD with a lot of nudity, sex, bondage and rape.  This movie is for you.

This was the first anime-hentai I've seen several years ago.  It's as hot now as it was then.  Six beautiful girls on a sea voyage gets apprehended by pirates.  The pirates take charge and dock the boat on a deserted island.  The girls manage to escape, but the pirates capture the girls one at a time and have their way with them by means of bondage, rape and torture.  In the end, the girls get their revenge.

This movie is definitely not for children.

This set can be hard to find under $100. It's been out of print a while and is among the best of Japanese Hentai.

The title says it all for the basic setting and it does revolve around the toy delivery concept but there's actually a decent story underneath as well that delves into revenge not just fantasy.

If your anime collection isn't just aimed at children, you should get this.

Pretty good in ways the main character got back at his "rapists". But be real, can a normal heterosexual man really man really be raped by multiple large breasted, beautiful women even if they left him on train tracks?... He is very lucky!!!
